name: Hope.
description:
Do not click outside of the game, or it will freeze. Reload page if loading takes too long. Please use the exe down below instead of the site if you can.  Walkthroughs on Ludum Dare page

BTW, if you cant hear anything, turn up the volume for your computer / google / whatever your using (maybe also click the game screen). For reference, you should be able to hear footsteps

# Controls

- WASD or arrow keys to move, Shift to run
- Space or W or Up arrow key to jump
- F to interact with things with shine

More info on game at: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/hope-1

Made for the Ludum Dare 46 theme "Keep it alive".
